OrgName: Certara USA, Inc. and all wholly-owned US subsidiaries including Pharsight Corporation
activities: Our company collects organization, contact and transaction information from current and potential customers.  Our clients are primarily in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry so our marketing and communication activity is focused to those sectors to provide updates, notices and support for our computer software.  The customer information is collected via direct interaction with the customer or as a result of the customer's visit to our website.
eucountries: France, Germany, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer organization, contact and transaction information
